Click to View Sample Module

Communication as Part of Employer Expectations


Challenge

As part of their online training program preparing women for careers in trade, Women Building Futures required a communications module teaching how to act in situations of conflict


Solution

By synthesizing the rugged design style of WBF with minimalistic tones, I created a scenario-based communications module covering most commonly encountered conflict scenarios in trades.


Technologies Used

Audition, Illustrator, Photoshop, Storyline
